for _ in range(int(input())):
    a = list(input().split())
    s = set(a)
    print('YES' if len(s) == 1 or (len(s) == 2 and a.count(a[0]) == 2) else 'NO')

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (a, b, c, d) = map(int, input().split())
    li = []
    li.append(a)
    li.append(b)
    li.append(c)
    li.append(d)
    li.sort()
    if li[0] == li[1] and li[2] == li[3]:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')
